entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon with 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Periods of light snow near the American border near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
